item.title: CVE-2021-22204|2024-08-03T18:37:18.092Z -- exiftool -- exiftool
item.description: Improper neutralization of user data in the DjVu file format in ExifTool versions 7.44 and up allows arbitrary code execution when parsing the malicious image
